doc.after: John Brown was born in Sheffield in 1816 the son of a slater At the age of 14 unwilling to follow his father s plans for him to become a draper he obtained a position as an apprentice with Earle Horton Co The company subsequently entered the steel business and at the age of 21 John Brown with the backing of his father and uncle obtained a bank loan for 500 to enable him to become the company s sales agent He was so successful he made enough money to set up his own business the Atlas Steel Works 4
